Test Case Details: Validate all UI elements are visible on login page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Verify page title is visible
3. Verify email input is visible
4. Verify password input is visible
5. Verify login button is visible
6. Verify register link is visible
Expected Results: All elements should be visible and correctly labeled

Test Case Details: Validate all form field labels are correctly displayed
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Check Email Address label
3. Check Password label
Expected Results: All labels should be visible with correct text

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter text in password field
3. Verify field type is password

Test Case Details: Validate register link redirects to register page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Click on 'Register here' link
3. Verify URL changes to /web/register
Expected Results: Should redirect to register page successfully

Test Case Details: Test login with empty email and password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Click Login without entering credentials
Expected Results: Should show validation error or HTML5 validation

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter email without @
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login
Expected Results: Should show invalid email format error

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Leave email empty
3. Enter password
4. Click Login

1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter valid email
3. Leave password empty
4. Click Login

1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter non-existent email
3. Enter any password
4. Click Login
5. Wait for response

1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter valid email (test@test.test)
3. Enter wrong password
4. Click Login
5. Wait for response

Test Case Details: Test successful login with valid user credentials
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter valid user email
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login
5. Wait for navigation
Post-Condition: User logged in and redirected to /web/products
Expected Results: Should show success message and redirect to products page

Test Case Details: Test successful login with admin credentials
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter admin email
3. Enter admin password
4. Click Login
5. Verify Admin link appears
Expected Results: Should login successfully and show Admin link in navbar

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click Login
4. Verify URL changes to /web/products
Expected Results: Should automatically redirect to products page after login

Test Case Details: Validate navbar elements change after login
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click Login
4. Check navbar for Profile; Logout links
Post-Condition: User logged in with updated navbar
Expected Results: Should show Profile; Logout; Wishlist; Notifications links

Test Case Details: Test accessing login page when already authenticated
Test Steps:
1. Login successfully
2. Navigate to /web/login again
3. Observe behavior
Expected Results: May redirect to home or show alert
